easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I swing in the air and make a breeze when you wag me. What am I?
easy.hint: It flies and has a tail.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of a small number of letters.

hard.q: Two siblings share a candle. Each one lights it for a different reason, and the candle never ends. What idea or concept explains this puzzle?
hard.a: infinite loop / recursion (metaphor: shared resource that keeps going)
hard.hint: Consider a process that keeps repeating without stopping.
